prompts: Create an electric-type Pokemon that resembles a small rodent with cute features and large ears.
Show me a playful Pokemon that can glide through the air, featuring vibrant yellow and black colors.
Design a Pokemon that is both adorable and energetic, with a fluffy tail and a charming personality.
Imagine a tiny Pokemon that loves to hang around trees and has a cheerful demeanor.
Generate an agile Pokemon that can quickly dart in and out of trees, showcasing its electric powers.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of adventure and has a sleek, streamlined body for gliding.
Give me a Pokemon that can easily adapt to urban environments but prefers forest habitats.
